nodes.text: A Batuu-bon was a sweet dessert served at Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo at Black Spire Outpost on Batuu. It was a spherical chocolate cake with a caf-flavored filling. The pastry was topped with a small disk-shaped chocolate treat depicting an emblem of Black Spire Outpost.

Batuu-bon is a dessert found in the real-world Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo at Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. The menu's description reads, "Chocolate cake, white chocolate mousse, coffee custard." The dessert also includes a small chocolate coin.
